General.Name: Shih Wei Navigation Co Ltd
General.Description: Shih Wei Navigation Co., Ltd. operates as a dry cargo shipping company in Taiwan. It engages in the shipping transportation, shipping agency, and ship management and chartering, as well as ship sale and purchase activities. The company trades in various types of bulk cargo, such as iron ore, coal, grains, steel products, cement clinker, machineries, wooden products, chemical products, wood pulp, and equipment, as well as industrial materials and logs. The company operates a fleet of 37 vessels. Shih Wei Navigation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 167, Fusing North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10547
